    Chief Human Resources Officers Network

    The Chief Human Resources Offcers Network provides a platform for academic medical centers senior executives to network, share ideas and access valuable UCH resources.

    Contact us
    • Angie Stefaniou
      angie.stefaniou@vizientinc.com
    • Adam Zuckermann
      adam.zuckermann@vizientinc.com

    Our Mission (CNO9)

    • Provide a forum for the most senior human resources executives within the UCH membership for candid and constructive discussions
    • Further the exchange of information. best practices and research on human resources issues
    • Providing leadership by evaluating, recommending and implementing human resources solutions to health care and related business challenges
    • Support the mission of UCH and its members to advance knowledge, foster collaboration and help members compete in their respective health care markets.

    Our leadership and steering committee

    Our current leadership includes:
    Chair: Maria Curran, VCU Medical Center

    • Maria Curran
    • Alisa Ford
    • Laurie Gunn
    • Sue Kopfle
    • Cheryl Locke
    • Kathleen McComber
    • Dawn Murphy
    • David Odato
    • Mary Ellen Schopp
    • Pat Wren

    Disclaimer

    We have recently migrated all network content onto our new digital platforms. Whilst we have brought most of our recent content, some older content is not available. Please contact us if you have any specific requests for access to content that is not here.
